name: 3D Arcade Game - Prototype
description:
Current Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right-Click - Throw trinket, and then expand it
  • E - Retract a trinket when looking at it
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Pause / Adjust the game sensitivity

Known Bugs:

  • The player must be in the same general y-value position as the trinket in order to retract it (ie. if you are above or below the trinket, you might not be able to retract it)

If you have any playtesting notes/comments, message the team lead, Nathan, on discord: Oswenn#4651
